TopicTitle: USS Lexington - Non welded stock supercarrier

Articles.Content:
The Gripen successfully landed and took off from the carrier. The deck didn't even flex when the Gripen touched down.

Nice! Carrier almost looks like the USS Langley!
Have you got a download of that? I'm wondering if my Chinooks could land on it.
